channel.description: Recent content in savings on KryoLogs

item.title: Day 0 - The Turning Point
item.description: This is the first post on my journey to financial freedom. I want to provide some context around why I’ve decided that I need something more. The origins of this story reach way back to when I was younger I want to begin at the true turning point. One day I was sitting looking at my bank account like many people do. I keep good track of my bills, I rarely ever subscribe to services, and I make good money working my day job.

item.title: Day 1 - Day Trading
item.description: If you read my previous post then you’ll know that my first major step to becoming financially free was to educate myself. I needed to learn money. As strange as that sounds I never learned money. You probably didn’t either. I can almost guarantee you weren’t taught money in school. You were taught to work for money so you were taught skills, albeit, mostly useless skills depending on your current occupation.
